title: Naughty Notions Vol. 1
description: Get Naughty & Satisfy Your Guilty Pleasures...Indulge with 13 tales of the erotic, humorous, and heartbroken.Lose yourself in a world filled with damaged children, ghostly guardians, and fanged lovers. Confront the wayward inhabitants that challenge the limits of human resolve. Submit to the will of an irate Master. Discover forbidden pleasures and grungy blessings:Demon Rights vs. Human Supremacy - Take a stand.Werewolf vs. Miniature Schnauzer - Place your bet.Addiction vs. Redemption - Pick a side.Daddy's Girl vs. Mommy's Regret - Decide who's right.Give in to the decadence of these thirteen short tales, explore the naughtiness buried within.Get Naughty! Grab your copy today.
author: Naughtie Scribe
